General.WarningLine1: Attention please! All the prizes are generated by this website, not related to the real lottery. If you won a prize, your balance is just a cool number to show off your friend.
General.WarningLine2: This is not a gamble website, no real money deposit or withdrawal. Feel free to get your lottery until your balance go negative!

Authentication.EmailOptional: Email is optional. Filling your email is currently only useful for recovering your password.

Warn.UsernameTooShort: Username is too short. At least 6 characters are required.
Warn.UsernameContainIllegalChars: Username can only have an english or number characters.
Warn.PasswordTooShort: Your password should be longer than 6 characters.
Warn.PasswordMissMatch: Your password and comfirn password are not matched.
Warn.InvalidEmail: This is not a valid email.

FirstPage.Slogan: The lottery simulator that won't consume your money, but won't give you a prize when you're lucky!
